attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To include VAT into the quoted price of products instead of seperatly, it is confusing for a lot of older people (myself included) when they go to pay for something only to find they have an extra 17.5% to pay. In the old days(before the scam of VAT) the price quoted was the price you paid. So do something useful for a change and change it.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
